With 15 years of experience OJ & Fridel have written, produced and engineered music internationally for both established and emerging artists and to accompany film, TV and theatre productions, amassing an impressive client list between them of Idris Elba, Louis Theroux, Diplo, Usher, Lethal Bizzle,Arrow Benjamin, Lisa Stansfield, the BBC and The National Theatre UK. Together they formed a production team of young talented producers working from their creative hub at Soho Sonic studios
